title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, July 6, 2021
description: Louis Pasteur successfully tested his rabies vaccine on this day in 1885 on a nine-year-old boy named Joseph Meister who was bitten by a rabid dog.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Louis Pasteur successfully tested his rabies vaccine on this day in 1885 on a nine-year-old boy named Joseph Meister who was bitten by a rabid dog.
